ygData.subject: Re: najena faction
ygData.msgSnippet: why on earth would you want increase faction with such a great kill =) btw, ort is a cleric now. makes him much harder to kill. used to be excellent easy xp
ygData.messageBody:
why on earth would you want increase faction with such a great kill =) btw,
ort is a cleric now. makes him much harder to kill. used to be excellent
easy xp for lv25-30.

kg
